name: Chili Cheese Dip
author: Diana Judd

ingredients.name: (8 to 10 oz.) can green chilies and tomatoes
lb. processed American Cheese, cut in small pieces

instructions: Brown ground beef, add taco seasoning and simmer as directions say. Add refried beans and 1/2 cup picante sauce. In a separate bowl, mix cream cheese and 1/4 cup picante sauce. Layer in 9 x 13 pan ending with a layer of cheese on top. Bake at 350Â° for 20 to 25 minutes. Use corn or tortilla chips to dip. For thicker dip: Stir in a paste or 2 Tbsp. flour and 3 Tbsp. water.
